translations.translation: Those are the Signs of the Wise Book -
These are the verses of the sagacious Book,
These are the verses of the Wise Book,
These are the verses of the Book of wisdom.
These are verses of the wise Book.
These are Ayat of the Wise Book.
These are verses of the Book of Wisdom
Those are the signs of the Wise Book
These are revelations of the wise Scripture,
These are the verses of the Book of wisdom,
These are verses of the Wise Book.
These are the signs of the wise Book,
These are Verses of the Wise Book,-
These are Verses of the Wise Book (the Quran).
Those are the verses of the Wise Book,
These are the Verses of the Wise Book.
These are verses of the wise Book,
[31:2] Those, namely, these signs, are the signs of the wise Book, the Qur’ān, the one containing wisdom (the genitive annexation [āyātu’l-kitābi’l-hakīm] has the [partitive] meaning of min, ‘from’);
(These are revelations of the wise Scripture) this surah consists of verses of the Qur'an which explain the lawful and the unlawful, the commands and prohibitions,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { تِلْكَ } الآيات المتلوة عليك يا أكمل الرسل امتناناً لك، واختصاصاً بشأنك { آيَاتُ ٱلْكِتَابِ } أي: نبذ من آيات الكتاب { ٱلْحَكِيمِ } [لقمان: 2] المشتمل على الحكمة المتقنة، المنبعثة عن اجتماع القدرة الكاملة والإرادة الخالصة، المترتبين على العلم الكامل الإلهي الذي لا يغيب عن حضرة حضوره ذرة من ذرائر ما لاحت عليه شمس الوجود
